THE AFL has today released the fixture for Week Two of the 2021 NAB AFL Womens Finals Series, with Preliminary Finals being hosted at Adelaide Oval and The Gabba next Saturday, April 10.

articles.title: Roosters v Warriors: Radley returns; club debut for Montoya - NRL.COM
articles.description: Roosters v Warriors: The wounded Roosters certainly have a job on their hands to quell the high-spirited Warriors, who turned a 19-point deficit into a three-point win over the Raiders last week.
articles.content:
The wounded Roosters certainly have a job on their hands to quell the high-spirited Warriors, who turned a 19-point deficit into a three-point win over the Raiders last week.
